message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I think it's a great deal and would be very valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I am willing to pay $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value in this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I believe $120 is a fair price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
